code: import{SET_STATE,UPDATE_EVENT}from'../actions/actionTypes';function allEvents(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_STATE:return Object.assign({},state,action.obj);case UPDATE_EVENT:var newState=JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(state));newState.events[action.content.eventIndex]=action.content.event;return newState;default:return state;}}export default allEvents;
